divs: Sighting DetailsMy daughter and I were outside walking to our car in a mountainous neighborhood. It was a bright and clear night with a full moon (or very close to it),and some clouds. My daughter looking up to admire the clouds in the light saw a satellite and pointed. Then, I looked up as well and then she exclaimed "WHOA! There are a whole bunch of them!" We started counting as they passed over, and in my range of site, I counted 12 in very close proximity. They were all moving at the same speed and were at somewhat staggared distances apart from each other. (Not evenly spaced).
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Boulder
There were no other sightings in Boulder on or around December 31st 2009
Summary: A dozen or more satellite -looking objects all in the same proximity moving from South to North
